example.en: She argued with him and then hit him.

example.en: We'll take everything that made Death Match a hit, combine it with everything we have at our disposal.

example.en: “When you hit someone, you can say ‘sorry’ and help them up.”

example.en: His wife slipped on a bar of soap and hit the washbasin.
